name: Bootstrap 5
description:
Now includes interactive components! Checkbox, radio, and switch, as well as hover effects for buttons. The spinner actually spins when in prototyping mode.


Components make use of the latest version of auto layout and variants and will be updated as Figma ships new features.


Also includes color styles.


Unlike other component libraries, you will not experience any annoying "missing font" dialog messages. The Bootstrap CSS uses system-ui font, which will be different on different operating systems. The font used in this file is therefore different from what you will see in some web browsers.


See also the Figma Community Bootstrap Icons file https://www.figma.com/community/file/972989644486753519/Bootstrap-Icons-v1.5.0
